data.title: Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition review - A Treasure Never Forgotten | TechStomper
data.meta_description:
'Beyond Good & Evil - 20th Anniversary Edition revives a long dormant series with the love and care it deserves, even adding new content for long-time fans.'

 - Stuart Cullen, TechStomper
